page.title: 17A SUNDAY WITH NEIL'S FAMILY
page.content: EVERY SUNDAY MORNING MY FAMILY AND I GET UP AT 10.30AM.THEN WE READ A PASSAGE FROM THE BIBLE AND WHEN WE ARE FINISHED WE GO TO CHURCH.THE SERVICE LASTS ABOUT AN HOUR AND A HALF.ONCE WE GET HOME WE HAVE DINNER THEN WE READ BOOKS. WE ARE NOT ALLOWED TO WATCH T.V OR GO OUT AND PLAY OR WORK.AT 4.45pm I GO TO SABBATH SCHOOL WITH MY FRIEND ALICK.AFTER THAT WE GO TO CHURCH AGAIN AT 6.00pm AND COME HOME AT 7.30pm.MY SISTERS GO TO BIBLE STUDY AT 7.30pm.THEN WHEN THEY COME HOME WE READ ANOTHER PASSAGE FROM THE BIBLE THEN GO TO BED.
